title: Biometrics for payments, events targeted as growth areas
description:
Biometrics at retailers and event venues made up a pair of the most-read stories of the week on Biometric Update, with Mastercard and NEC striking a deal on technology for point-of-sale systems, and a webinar featuring Veridas describing a market area with major growth potential. Decentralized digital ID is on the minds of influential people, while IN Groupe’s acquisition of Danish digital ID products adds to another modest wave of consolidation following a slower period for M&A.
